General.Name: Nova Royalty Corp
General.Description: Nova Royalty Corp., a royalty company, focuses on the acquisition and management of royalties on the copper and nickel deposits. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 543 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1X8
